#summary A brief introduction to Maxtable Query Language (MQL)

MQL is based on the style of traditional relational query language.
  * *CREATE TABLE*.....create table table_name (column1 type1, ...,cloumnx type x) 
  * *INSERT*....................insert into table_name (column1_value,...columnx_value)
  * *DELETE*..................delete table_name (column1_value)
  * *SELECT*..................select table_name (column1_value)
  * *DROP*.....................drop table_name
